map.field.fieldtype

Interface IStreet

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Street

    public interface IStreet
    this interface provides methods for street fields e.g. speed limit getter or direction getter..
    Author:
    Josef Weldemariam, Matr. 7316168

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Direction> getDirection()
      get a list of Direction for a Street field
      Direction getFlowDirection()
      returns the pipe capacity for a street field
      int getPipeCapacity()
      returns the pipe capacity for a street field
      int getPipeCosts()
      returns the pipe costs for a street field
      int getSpeedLimit()
      returns the speed limit of a street field
      boolean is_constructionSite() 
      boolean isConnectingRoad()
      returns true if the street field is a connecting street field of the maps
